reviewText: I doubt if Frances Durbridge would've approved this series! Bears hardly any resemblance to the radio series (which is absolutely excellent!). It was just a little difficult to really like the characters. I haven't watched the whole series yet. I hope it gets better!
FOR FANS OF ACTOR MICHAEL GOTHARD HE WORKED IN PAUL TEMPLE IN THE DISC ONE IN THE FIRST EPISODE GAME PEOPLE PLAY. HE WAS A VERY ELEGANT AND BEAUTYFUL ACTOR.
